data.md:MetaData: Pollen profile JOLAN1, Le Jolan, France
Peat bog. Physiography: valley in old volcanic area. Surrounding vegetation: forest and pasture. Local vegetation: Picea and Pinus. Location: north east of the site
Recherches pollenanalytiques sur l'histoire de la végétation de la bordure nord du Massif du Cantal (Massif-Central, France)
